summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Waterworks System; providing for the construction of a pipeline on Denny Way and East Denny Way from Melrose Avenue to Bell Street, and other streets; designating the same as one of the additions and betterments to and extensions of the Municipal Waterworks System contemplated by Ordinance No. 62959, as amended by Ordinance No. 63382, authorizing the expenditure, and appropriating money therefor.
